dmca.title: Christian Polygamy Site Claims Unauthorized Copying
dmca.body:
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION
	November 28, 2003

This is sent according to the instructions at: http://www.google.com/dmca.html

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on www.christianpolygamy.info/bigamy/

2.	Search Query: christian polygamy bigamy
	Infringing Web Pages:
usmarriagelaws.com/search/united_states/polygamy/christian_polygamy/index.shtml

	Search Query: christian laws bigamy 
	Infringing Web Pages; usmarriagelaws.com/search/united_states/polygamy/christian_polygamy/index.shtml


3. You may contact me at the email address:
	[private]

4. The infringing     site's contact info may be found at: http://usmarriagelaws.com/states/license/hospitality_group_network.shtml 
Email: [private]

[private]
[private]
[private]

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7.

[private]
[private]
Old Orchard Beach, ME 04064

8. Mailed to:
	Google, Inc.
	Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
	[private]
	Mountain View, CA 94043

ADDITIONAL COMMENT:  Note the writing style on original page is rightly similar to other pages at www.christianpolygamy.info. But, note the illogical titling on the infringing page as if the contents are about "Christian Polygamy" when it is only a definition of "bigamy."
